channel.title: Ham
channel.description: how the heck do u use it :confused: :P

item.title: Ham
item.dc:creator: @F0rum_Mvp F0rum Mvp
item.description:
@F0rum_Mvp wrote:

Here is a simple run through on how it works.

ok, if you look on server advertisement, some servers will need you to have hamachi for you to join the server. look on that thread at the hamachi username (e.g Server 1-10). Now look in the bottom right corner of your hamachi box and look for a triangle with 3 dots symbol, not the the circle one. Click on join existing network and type in the server username and pass. On a thread it could say ( user: Server 1-10 Pass: 123). Make sure you use capital letters and spaces as it is shown. Now look for the owner of the serverâ€™s ip and check if the server is online. check you have the right port and you should be able to log on a ham server.

Sorry if this is a bit long and confusing.

Read full topic
